漏洞类型参考表

ID 中文名称 英文名称 简写
1 SQL注入 SQL Injection sql-inj
2 弱密码 Weak Password weak-pass
3 跨站请求伪造 Cross Site Request Forgery csrf
4 跨站漏洞 Cross Site Scripting xss
5 命令执行 Command Execution cmd-exec
6 代码执行 Code Execution code-exec
7 文件上传 File Upload file-upload
8 越权访问 Privilege Escalation privilege-escalation
9 信息泄露 Information Disclosure info-disclosure
10 暴力破解 Brute Force brute-force
10 登录绕过 Login Bypass login-bypass
11 遍历目录 Directory Listing dir-listing
12 拒绝服务 Denial of Service dos
13 缓冲区溢出 Buffer Overflow buffer-overflow
14 数据库发现 Database Found db-found
15 远程文件包含 Remote File Inclusion rfi
16 本地文件包含 Local File Inclusion lfi
17 任意文件下载 Arbitrary File Download file-download
18 任意文件创建 Arbitrary File Creation file-creation
19 任意文件删除 Arbitrary File Deletion file-deletion
20 任意文件读取 Arbitrary File Read file-read
21 远程密码修改 Remote Password Change remote-pass-change
22 其他类型 Other other
